alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:03PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Butte and central Meade Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 102 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Hereford, or 31 miles east of Sturgis, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Union Center around 115 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fairpoint. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
